name: Charge! Tank Squad!
description:
A monstrous assault is taking place on your PSP® system and it's up to you, the tank commander, to wipe out the relentless invading enemy forces. You must stay on deadly alert as these armies are devious and will change up their attack style to overpower you. Deploy all types of weapons and seize power ups in a crusade to save your base before your energy and your funding run out!
Recommended for one or two players and playable using a single PSP® system.
Download Charge! Tank Squad! today!
"PSP" is a registered trademark of Sony Computer Entertainment Inc.
Purchase or use of this item is subject to the PlayStation®Network Terms of Service and this item’s use restrictions. If you do not wish to accept all these terms, do not purchase or use this item. One-time license fee for downloads to up to 2 portable systems that are associated with the purchasing account.
